crypto.name: Crypto Slide Quest
crypto.desc: I lost my secret key and the flag while writing this challenge, can you help me out? Ciphertext base64: LEs2fVVxNDMfNHEtcx80cB8nczQfJhVkDHI/Ew==

crypto.name: enCRCroach
crypto.desc: I implemented a super secure alternative to JWE and disabled the 'admin' account, but our server traffic logs still shows someone reading out their flag. How is that possible?!

misc.name: Chessbros
misc.desc: I've been wanting to join this chess club for a while now, but I can't seem to figure out the secret password to get in. Can you help me? Apparently the first 40 and last 8 half-moves are all theory ;). This challenge follows the normal flag format.

misc.name: danggit part 1
misc.desc: The developer who set up this challenge has left the company. Unfortunately, they forgot to share their code before leaving, and we have no idea how it works. All we could find was an email containing their commit history ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

misc.name: nauseous process
misc.desc:
I've been talking to this obnoxious elf binary, he's super talkative but I think he mentioned he wanted to give you a flag or something.
Required reading:
- ELF format
- dynamic linking + GOT + PLT

misc.name: orakl password checker
misc.desc:
I was reading up on password hashes for my new startup, orakl. apparently they're supposed to take a really long time?
Required reading:
- intro to x86 + x86_64
- basic documentation for a disassembler of your choosing (try Ghidra, or IDA Free)

misc.name: roplon
misc.desc:
I THINK that buffer is big enough, right?
Required reading:
- x86_64 calling conventions
- Return Oriented Programming

pwn.name: tank
pwn.desc:
I think it's time we blow this scene.
Get everybody and the stuff together.
Okay, three, two, one, let's... figure out wtf "const variable" means.

BADA DADA DADA DADAAADAAAAAAA

pwn.name: tank bonus
pwn.desc:
alright now do it without the freebie shell function. Here's a libc:

Note: This is just Tank game but without a helpful convenience function. you can technically solve in either order but solving Tank game first will be easier.

rev.name: Guess the password
rev.desc: Once you give it the password, it will show you the flag! APK

rev.name: Halloweened
rev.desc: My halloween costume was Link! halloweened

rev.name: There is a bug
rev.desc: Bob is reckless when developing apps. He just created an app that can show the flag with the correct password. However, he just couldn't get the flag even with the right password, could you help him to fix the bug? APK
